experiments.name: Hodgkin-Huxley NEURON simulation
experiments.description: The Hodgkin-Huxley model (or conductance-based model) is a mathematical model that describes how action potentials in neurons are initiated and propagated. It is a set of nonlinear differential equations that approximates the electrical characteristics of excitable cells such as neurons.
